name: grr_hunt_file
short_description: Starts a GRR hunt for a list of files.
description:
Starts a GRR hunt for a list of files and provides a Hunt ID to the user. Feed the Hunt ID to `grr_huntresults_ts` to process results through Plaso and export them to Timesketch.

Like in `grr_files_collect`, files can be globs and support variable interpolation.
args: Comma-separated list of file paths to hunt for.
Whether to verify the GRR TLS certificate.
Maximum size of files to collect (in bytes).
Match mode of the client rule set (ANY or ALL)
Comma-separated list of client operating systems to filter hosts on.
Comma-separated list of client labels to filter GRR hosts on.
